column5: Don't forget the poker chips!  I marked the date on my calender but I'm not 100% at this point.

I need a two B/R this year Lex and boy was it tempting to check out the one on the point there.  I think ya know what I mean.     But, just to be nice, I took the more $$$ one up from the docks next to the Lodge.   Oh yeah ... you're welcome.
Booked cottage #9 for Friday - Monday
That's great Dan, see you guys up there........
lookin' forward to it
Cool - We'll be neighbors.  Currently booked in Cabin 8.
O.K. It is official Cabin 11 will play host to Chrisk ,Spiel ,Joe and Art we are full and ready to fish. Wed 15th to the Sun 19th.   Art
Well that is one of my days off on the Friday, 17th of June so I may just make the trek up to Lakair this year!

Being Father's Day weekend it is tough for me with young boys to get away for the weekend. I'm only an hour away so I'll try and make it up there for the Friday night. I'll call Kevin about a tent site.
we'd love to make it up there for the g2g this year, but we're getting married that weekend.  we'll definitely be planning a trip up there sometime this summer   ryan
Been awhile
Barb and i will be there too Dann. Looking forward to meeting you guys. Do your tents have good ventilation

Paul, if you're gonna be there, I am gonna do my darndest to come up. Save a seat in your boat for me on the Saturday.....if you want that is. I just got permission from the boss, I am gonna be be there for the Saturday!
Mercman, after all the salt you have been rubbing into my wounds the last 2 days, I have cut the roof off the tent you and Barb will be in.
Thats good news Skeets. Now i have to find out who will be in the lots next to ours. My is registered as a lethal weapon and i am obliged by law to inform people.

No prob to set things up on the dock Ryan. Could probably fit the service in between the pike derby and the awards...  A moonlight cruise through the narrows can be very romantic while swatting the mosquitos.....
Let me know what he says about the tent sites.  I'd like to come up for a day.  Can't stay the entire weekend though..
That would be great to fill the place up that week-end.   Lots of new folks to finally meet.
Almost had to cancel due to some babysitting issues but we are good to go again
Cool.   Probably before too long, the 'Offical' Roll call thread will be put up.
Dan if you need me to baby sit you and Sam just ask.....    Art

i will be there with Shorty  gonna go out and put a fish farm net out and all the big pike i catch will go in there.  This way i can win the trophy this year and keep it in norther Ontario  any other northerners going this year ? Hope so would like to meet some other peps that fish nippissing.

Ok boys and girls after many hours of deliberation with the mod group we have come up with the dates of June18th/19th for our Lakair G2G.Muskie,pike and walleye seasons will be open so we'll have lots of stuff to do. Pike derby and fish fry on the Saturday as usual.Looking forward to seeing you all there  www.lakair.com
WOW

What took you so long  ?    I already made my reservations a few weeks ago.   Pulling in Friday the 17th and staying the entire next week.   We'll be in Cabin 8 this year.  My son-in-law wants to come along for his first-ever Canadian Fishing adventure.  Is there any better way to initiate someone than an OFC GTG  (Don't answer that    )
Heres another reason why I'm exited about this G2G  I get to keep this trophy for yet another year unless one of my fellow OFC'ers are good enough,sorry,lucky enough to take it from me
Miss Kelly and I will be there again!!!!
Oh yeah you are going to lose that for sure
One of these years ... that trophy is heading SOUTH of the border.
Set on my calendar.  Probably arrive Friday and leave Monday if we can find a babysitter
I think you lost that horseshoe at Lakair couple years ago and I think I found it. Makes it kind of hard to walk though
Rich, It would be my pleasure to hand it off to you or one of our other southern OFC'ers but action speaks louder than words bubba
I'm really hoping to make it this time.

Looks very interesting, I will be following this & seeing if anyone is interested in sharing a cabin or trailer, I have a 16' Skeeter 60 hp & a 14' Smoker Craft 25 hp electric Trolling motor on both, just started a new Supervisors position at work & I'm not sure when I'll be able to take Holiday's. SBK
Would love to see you all again...up in the air for now tho.

Went to the website, the place looks quite reasonable. What's the fishing like?  I've never fished Nippissing, but it isn't very far away.  I'd be interested in some feedback -- always looking for a good place to go.  Just curious. Thanks
Check out the photo gallery on the Lakair site. That pretty much sums it up.
If you happen to talk to Kevin or Leslie Chris, please tell them they owe me an answer on a cottage....
Hey John, Diane and I will be there August 6-20 in the same cabin as last year.
Retirement is a wonderful thing Lew......will take it under advisement with my vacation scheduler
Cabin 11 is gone Daplumma and Aplumma have it from Wed 15th till Sun 19th.   Art
Awesome Art, looking forward to seeing you and Joe again this year.
We will be there, poker and darts all ready
Keep your boats off that new long ramped floating dock.. I may drop in and need a place to park!
No worries lots of float plane docking at Samoset......
